title: Demo app panics if you click on Organize windows
body:
**Describe the bug**
<!-- A clear and concise description of what the bug is. An image is good, a gif or movie is better! -->
The demo app panics if you click on the "Organize windows" button in the bottom right corner. Both on Desktop and Web.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: <!-- e.g. iOS --> Fedora 38
 - Browser <!-- e.g. chrome, safari --> Firefox
 - Version <!-- e.g. 22 -->119.0.1

**Additional context**
<!-- Add any other context about the problem here. -->
Bug introduced by #3172 (confirmed via bisect).
